subject: Fwd: Recap for "Wolfpack Projects Sync"
preview: Hey team.   Recap of the weekly projects sync.   Have a great week ahead. Let's go! 🚀     ---------- Forwarded message ---------  From: Fathom <no-reply@fathom.video>  Date: Mon, Apr 28, 2025

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hey team.

Recap of the weekly projects sync.

Have a great week ahead. Let's go! 🚀

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Fathom <no-reply@fathom.video>
Date: Mon, Apr 28, 2025 at 10:25 AM
Subject: Recap for "Wolfpack Projects Sync"
To: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>


Meeting Purpose Sync on Wolfpack Projects, review progress, and align on priorities for the week ahead. Key Takeaways - Multiple high-priority projects nearing completion (Gecko, MGA, LifeWorks) - New part-time designer joining to support Jaime; SOP documentation needed - Several potential new sales projects in design phase (Hoss Portal, Lively Fischio, CineMedia) - Team achieved significant progress despite short week (Easter Monday, Anzac Day) Topics Project Status Overview - Mayo: Awaiting client feedback - LifeWorks: Key focus area, Joel leading - Two websites in final checks - Four projects on track - Lion: New project kicking off, designs ready for internal review High-Priority Projects - Gecko: Few items remaining, Glen to complete today with Joel's assistance - MGA: Aiming to go live this week, Glen to focus after Gecko - LifeWorks: Joel steering, staging environment ready, 1-2 templates to be completed by EOD Tuesday - Challenger Law: Daphne handling final items Ongoing Projects - Johnny Geo: SEO recommendations reassigned to Glen - Mayo: Pending Cindy's review - Internal tools: Jaime working on image updates (9 remaining) - All Parks & Master Lock: Awaiting client feedback - Lion redesign: Completed, pending review before client submission - Shellshoft: Glen 40% complete, using WP Bakery Design Projects - High priority: Hoss Portal (due April 30) and Lively Fischio - CineMedia, MS Brain Bank: Also on Jaime's list - Andy advised keeping designs lightweight for potential new sales projects Team Updates - New part-time designer joining to work with Jaime - SOP documentation needed for design process - Care plan management meeting scheduled (Cindy, Joel, Manuel, Rica) - AccuField UK redesign signed 13 days ago, to be queued for mid-May Wins and Achievements - Jaime's one-touch designs for Lion and Master Lock - Joel's progress on internal tools and speed website - Rica's completion of larger tasks - Manuel's extensive updates (240+ items) - Bloodvolt monthly reports cleaned up - ClickUp improvements by Cindy Next Steps - Glen to complete Gecko items today, then focus on MGA - Joel to prepare 1-2 LifeWorks templates for staging by EOD Tuesday - Jaime to prioritize Hoss Portal design (due April 30), then Lively Fischio - Jaime to complete remaining 9 images for internal tools - Andy to manage expectations for Little Scribblers project (early May start) - Cindy to schedule care plan management meeting with Joel, Manuel, and Rica - Team to prepare for new part-time designer onboarding - Jaime to document design process SOP for new designer
Internal Meeting
Wolfpack Projects Sync
April 28, 2025 • 23 mins • View Meeting or Ask Fathom
Action Items ✨
Complete Gecko items today. Collab w/ Joel on auto-generated text for address typing
Glen Tenorio
Assist Glen w/ Gecko auto-generated text feature. Focus LifeWorks pages, complete 1-2 templates by EOD Tue
Joel Maligalig
Finish remaining Challenger Law items
Daphne Bautista
Johnny Geo inner pages SEO recommendations. Use Cindy's link for page analysis (focus on H1 issues)
Glen Tenorio
Queue Mayo project. Inform Glen of any needed updates
Cindy Valderama
Finish 9 remaining images for internal tools (high priority). Send to Lance. Prioritize Hoss Portal design (due 4/30), then Lively Fischio. Create lightweight homepage designs for Hoss Portal, Lipos, Simina (no mobile). Document design SOP for new designer onboarding
Jaime Velasquez
Schedule care plan mgmt meeting w/ Joel, Manuel, Rica. Complete setup of new tracking solution first
Cindy Valderama
Meeting Summary ✨
General Template Customize • Change Template

Meeting Purpose

Sync on Wolfpack Projects, review progress, and align on priorities for the week ahead.

Key Takeaways

  • Multiple high-priority projects nearing completion (Gecko, MGA, LifeWorks)

  • New part-time designer joining to support Jaime; SOP documentation needed

  • Several potential new sales projects in design phase (Hoss Portal, Lively Fischio, CineMedia)

  • Team achieved significant progress despite short week (Easter Monday, Anzac Day)

Topics

Project Status Overview

  • Mayo: Awaiting client feedback

  • LifeWorks: Key focus area, Joel leading

  • Two websites in final checks

  • Four projects on track

  • Lion: New project kicking off, designs ready for internal review

High-Priority Projects

  • Gecko: Few items remaining, Glen to complete today with Joel's assistance

  • MGA: Aiming to go live this week, Glen to focus after Gecko

  • LifeWorks: Joel steering, staging environment ready, 1-2 templates to be completed by EOD Tuesday

  • Challenger Law: Daphne handling final items

Ongoing Projects

  • Johnny Geo: SEO recommendations reassigned to Glen

  • Mayo: Pending Cindy's review

  • Internal tools: Jaime working on image updates (9 remaining)

  • All Parks & Master Lock: Awaiting client feedback

  • Lion redesign: Completed, pending review before client submission

  • Shellshoft: Glen 40% complete, using WP Bakery

Design Projects

  • High priority: Hoss Portal (due April 30) and Lively Fischio

  • CineMedia, MS Brain Bank: Also on Jaime's list

  • Andy advised keeping designs lightweight for potential new sales projects

Team Updates

  • New part-time designer joining to work with Jaime

  • SOP documentation needed for design process

  • Care plan management meeting scheduled (Cindy, Joel, Manuel, Rica)

  • AccuField UK redesign signed 13 days ago, to be queued for mid-May

Wins and Achievements

  • Jaime's one-touch designs for Lion and Master Lock

  • Joel's progress on internal tools and speed website

  • Rica's completion of larger tasks

  • Manuel's extensive updates (240+ items)

  • Bloodvolt monthly reports cleaned up

  • ClickUp improvements by Cindy

Next Steps

  • Glen to complete Gecko items today, then focus on MGA

  • Joel to prepare 1-2 LifeWorks templates for staging by EOD Tuesday

  • Jaime to prioritize Hoss Portal design (due April 30), then Lively Fischio

  • Jaime to complete remaining 9 images for internal tools

  • Andy to manage expectations for Little Scribblers project (early May start)

  • Cindy to schedule care plan management meeting with Joel, Manuel, and Rica

  • Team to prepare for new part-time designer onboarding

  • Jaime to document design process SOP for new designer
